sourcesContent:
<template>
  <TopBar :showBackButton="!isAtHomeView" :title="viewTitle"/>
  <router-view v-slot="{ Component, route }" class="main-container">
    <transition :name="route.meta.transition">
      <component :is="Component" />
    </transition>
  </router-view>
</template>

<script>
import TopBar from './components/ui/TopBar.vue';
import store from "./stores/store.js";
import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';
import { useAppState } from './stores/appState.js';
import { useWpcEditStore } from './stores/wpcEditStore.js';

const WpcEditStore = useWpcEditStore(store);

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    TopBar,
  },
  props: {
  },
  setup() {
    console.log("this.romIsLoaded : "+this.romIsLoaded)
    console.log("this.currentRomData : "+this.currentRomData)
    // restore rom data from cache:
    if( this.romIsLoaded && !this.currentRomData ) {
      console.log("get from cache")
      WpcEditStore.getRomFromCache();
    }
    // never give access to any sub pages if no rom is loaded:
    if(!this.romIsLoaded) {
      this.$router.push('/');
    }

    const AppState = useAppState(store);
    //store.dispatch("POPULATE_FROM_CACHE");
    const { viewTitle, isAtHomeView, romIsLoaded, currentRomData } = storeToRefs(AppState);
    return {
      viewTitle,
      isAtHomeView,
      romIsLoaded,
      currentRomData
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
    }
  },
  mounted() {
  }
}

</script>

<style>
  @import './assets/variables.css';
  @import './assets/graphics.css';
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inria+Sans:wght@300;400;700&display=swap');

  html {
    font-size: 62.5%;
    font-family: 'Inria Sans', sans-serif;
  } 
  
  body {
    background: var(--grey2);
  }

  #app {
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  }

  .headline {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: var(--text-lg);
    color: var(--grey9);
    margin: var(--space-md) 0;
  }

  .body-sm {
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: var(--text-sm);
    line-height: var(--text-leading-sm);
    color: var(--grey9);
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
    max-width: 66rem;
  }
  
  .label-md {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: var(--text-md);
    line-height: var(--text-leading-sm);
    color: var(--grey9);
    margin: 0;
  }
  .label-sm {
    font-weight: 300;
    font-size: var(--text-sm);
    line-height: var(--text-leading-sm);
    color: var(--grey9);
    margin: 0;
  }
  .text-accent {
    color: var(--accent);
  }

  .main-container {
    width: 102rem;
    margin: 12rem auto;
  }

  hr {
    border-style: solid;
    border-color: var(--grey7);
    margin: var(--space-lg) 0;
  }

  .slide-left-enter-active {
    transition: all 1s ease-out;
  }
  .slide-left-enter-from,
  .slide-left-leave-to {
    /*transform: translateX(100%);*/
    opacity: 0;
  }
</style>
